trustfund:
TF036605-CAPE VERDE - PRIVATIZATION AND
            REGULATORY CAPACITY BUILDING PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
Ratings for the Privatization Technical
            Assistance Project for Cape Verde were as follows: outcomes
            were satisfactory, project sustainability was likely, Bank
            performance was satisfactory, and Borrower performance was
            also satisfactory. Some lessons learned included: labor laws
            needed to be flexible, as they are a little better now.
            Several methods of privatization took place - selling of
            shares of State-owned Enterprises (SOEs) by public
            floatation, workers/manager busy out public bid for whole
            companies' private negotiations, liquidation with
            selling of assets. Several financial engineering for workers
            participation in privatization of SOEs. It is a political
            issue as long as it was the beginning of the liberalization
            of the economy and its detractors elected privatization as a
            political fact of every campaign for national and municipal elections.
